title: Chris Wraight is the author of the Horus Heresy novel Scars, the novella Brotherhood of the Storm and the audio drama The Sigillite. For Warhammer 40,000 he has written the Space Wolves novels Blood of Asaheim andStormcaller, and the short story collection Wolves of Fenris, as well as the Space Marine Battles novels Wrath of Iron and Battle of the Fang. Additionally, he has many Warhammer novels to his name, including the Time of Legends novel Master of Dragons, which forms part of the War of Vengeance series
Chris lives and works near Bristol, in south-west England. A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION Battle of the Fang © Games Workshop Ltd
The Hunt for Magnus © Games Workshop Ltd
